polished_script:
HOOK: While you're planning holiday breaks, someone else is planning to bury you. [ON-SCREEN: "Someone is planning to BURY YOU"]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: Every December, same story. Market slows down, competitors vanish, and you tell yourself you'll go hard come January first. [ON-SCREEN: "EVERY DECEMBER..."] Paul Salter, mindset coach to seven-figure producers, says that thinking is exactly what keeps you average. [ON-SCREEN: "Paul Salter - Mindset Coach"]

[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: But here's what the top 5% know that everyone else ignores.

INSIGHT: Paul calls these next few months "separation season" â€” not downtime, separation season. [ON-SCREEN: "SEPARATION SEASON"] While 80% of agents use holidays as an excuse, the elite 5% use them as a weapon. [ON-SCREEN: "80% make excuses / 5% make moves"] They're calling past clients who closed six months ago. They're door-knocking expired listings on Saturday mornings when zero competition exists. [ON-SCREEN: "ZERO COMPETITION"] They're building the pipeline that explodes in Q1 while everyone else scrambles in January.

REFRAME: The gap between you and them doesn't widen in January â€” it widens right now. Every December you coast, you're not losing one month, you're losing the compounding advantage of being the only agent still showing up. [ON-SCREEN: "BE THE ONLY ONE SHOWING UP"]

CTA: "Are you treating December as separation season or vacation season â€” which one?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."

---

CAPTION: While 80% of agents coast through December, the top 5% use it as separation season. Which are you? ðŸŽ¯

HASHTAGS: #RealEstate #SeparationSeason #AgentTips #HolidayHustle #RealEstateSuccess

SHAREABLE_MOMENT: "The gap between you and them doesn't widen in January â€” it widens right now."

PERFORMANCE_NOTES: 
1. Deliver HOOK with intensity and slight pause after "someone else"
2. Emphasize contrast words: "80% vs 5%", "excuse vs weapon", "December vs January" 
3. Lean forward slightly during REFRAME for intimacy and urgency

_metadata.rewrite_changelog: Added concrete examples to INSIGHT (past clients, sphere, expireds) and completely rewrote CTA with specific action steps: open CRM, filter last 12 months, send voice note, deadline before lunch. Turned vague 'five calls' into a tactical play they can execute immediately.
_metadata.judge_note: Five calls to WHO about WHATâ€”expired listings, past clients, sphereâ€”specificity turns this from a 5 to an 8.
